revision.text: {{ArticleHistory | action1 = AFD | action1date = 08:37, 25 March 2007 | action1link = Wikipedia:Articles for deletion/2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (Light Infantry) | action1result = kept | action1oldid = 117714921 | action2 = GAN | action2date = 12:22, 24 September 2009 | action2link = Talk:2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)/GA1 | action2result = listed | action2oldid = 315790225 | currentstatus = GA | topic = War }} {{talkheader}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Military history|class=GA|US=y|Cold-War=y}} {{WikiProject United States|class=GA|importance=Low|USMIL=y}} }} {{Talk:2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)/GA1}} == Dead link == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.drum.army.mil/sites/tenants/ ** In [[10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-05-23 02:09:34, 404 NOT FOUND ** In [[10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-01 01:57:30, 404 NOT FOUND ** In [[2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-19 06:12:28, 404 NOT FOUND --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 06:13, 19 June 2011 (UTC) == Dead link 2 == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.tioh.hqda.pentagon.mil/Div/10MountainDivision.htm ** In [[10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-05-23 02:09:26, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-05-25 06:51:56, 404 Not Found ** In [[10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-01 01:56:41, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-10 03:33:16, 404 Not Found ** In [[2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-19 06:12:40, 404 Not Found --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 06:13, 19 June 2011 (UTC) == Dead link 3 == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.drum.army.mil/sites/about/hist-10mtn.asp ** In [[10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-05-23 02:09:26, 404 NOT FOUND ** In [[1st Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-05-25 06:51:56, 404 NOT FOUND ** In [[10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-01 01:56:07, 404 NOT FOUND ** In [[1st Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-10 03:33:21, 404 NOT FOUND ** In [[2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]] on 2011-06-19 06:12:54, 404 NOT FOUND --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 06:13, 19 June 2011 (UTC) == out of date == the last combat entry was "before 2009". since 2009 the unit has gone on an SFAT combat tour to paktika province afghanistan mostly occupying fob sharona, and in 2009 to fob hammer iraq, and the surrounding OE( Operational Enviroment). [[User:Phillip.a.ludlow|Phillip.a.ludlow]] ([[User talk:Phillip.a.ludlow|talk]]) 06:50, 25 July 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=707718458 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20090901061129/http://www.tioh.hqda.pentagon.mil:80/Div/10MountainDivision.htm to http://www.tioh.hqda.pentagon.mil/Div/10MountainDivision.htm When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=true}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 11:28, 1 March 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[2nd Brigade Combat Team, 10th Mountain Division (United States)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=741787401 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20090531192927/http://www.defenselink.mil/news/newsarticle.aspx?id=43634 to http://www.defenselink.mil/news/newsarticle.aspx?id=43634 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 17:38, 29 September 2016 (UTC)
